title: as lame as the april fools joke was
body:
because it's basically rehashing a thread from old gd that someone made after like a month of the oce server existing

i didnt expect to actually be disappointed by it

what disappointed me?

Annie's localised name is Annie.

Why is this a disappointment?

BECAUSE RIOT MISSED THE PERFECT CHANCE TO REFERENCE A STORY THAT WAS DEAR TO COUNTLESS AUSSIE/NZ KIDS
http://assets.flicks.co.nz/images/movies/poster/fb/fb3ea77a2b3f8e7cb0e4e6699568d43d_500x735.jpg
